usage.cn: 当你还有得机会选择时，不妨冒险一试。
usage.eng: Take the chance while you still have the choice.

usage.cn: 人生很简单，做了决定就不要后悔。
usage.eng: Life is simple.You make choices and you don't look back.

usage.cn: 决定我们成为什么样人的，不是我们的能力，而是我们的选择。
usage.eng: It is not our abilities that show what we truly are, it is our choices.

usage.cn: 决定我们一生的，不是我们的能力，而是我们的选择
usage.eng: It is our choices that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.
